statements: SELECT * FROM boxing_equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity, price FROM boxing_equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM boxing_equipment_inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM boxing_equipment_inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, price FROM boxing_equipment_inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM boxing_equipment_inventory ORDER BY equipment_name DESC, price ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM boxing_equipment_inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT equipment_name, price FROM boxing_equipment_inventory WHERE quantity >= 10 AND price < 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC, price DESC
SELECT * FROM boxing_equipment_inventory WHERE quantity < 5 OR price > 200
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity, price FROM boxing_equipment_inventory
SELECT * FROM boxing_equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, price FROM boxing_equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, quantity FROM boxing_equipment_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, price FROM boxing_equipment_inventory WHERE price < 50;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM boxing_equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_type = 'Gloves';
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, price FROM boxing_equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, price FROM boxing_equipment_inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, quantity, price FROM boxing_equipment_inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_details WHERE discount > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, quantity, price, discount FROM boxing_equipment_inventory JOIN pricing_details ON boxing_equipment_inventory.equipment_id = pricing_details.equipment_id WHERE pricing_details.discount > 5;
SELECT * FROM boxing_equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM boxing_equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT equipment_name, price FROM boxing_equipment_inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM boxing_equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_id, price FROM boxing_equipment_inventory WHERE price < 50;
SELECT * FROM boxing_equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, price FROM boxing_equipment_inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, price FROM boxing_equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 5 AND price < 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM boxing_equipment_inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_categories WHERE category_name LIKE '%gloves%' AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM boxing_equipment_inventory;
SELECT product_name, price FROM pricing_details WHERE price < 50;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM product_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, price FROM suppliers s JOIN pricing_details p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM boxing_equipment_inventory WHERE product_category = 'Gloves' ORDER BY supplier_id DESC, product_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, price FROM pricing_details WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, price FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN pricing_details p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, price DESC
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM pricing_details WHERE product_category IN ('Gloves', 'Mouthguard') ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC, price ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(price) AS total_cost FROM pricing_details p INNER JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_cost > 1000 ORDER BY total_cost DESC
SELECT * FROM boxing_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, price FROM boxing_equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Gloves';
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, price FROM boxing_equipment ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT ei.inventory_id, ei.quantity, be.equipment_name FROM equipment_inventory ei JOIN boxing_equipment be ON ei.equipment_id = be.equipment_id;

SELECT manufacturer_name, COUNT(em.manufacturer_id) AS equipment_count FROM manufacturers m JOIN equipment_manufacturer em ON m.manufacturer_id = em.manufacturer_id GROUP BY manufacturer_name ORDER BY equipment_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM boxing_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, price FROM boxing_equipment WHERE equipment_type='Gloves';
SELECT e.equipment_name, p.price FROM boxing_equipment e JOIN pricing_details p ON e.equipment_id = p.equipment_id;
SELECT e.equipment_name, m.manufacturer_name FROM boxing_equipment e JOIN equipment_manufacturer em ON e.equipment_id = em.equipment_id JOIN manufacturers m ON em.manufacturer_id = m.manufacturer_id;
SELECT e.equipment_name, COUNT(*) as total_quantity FROM boxing_equipment e JOIN equipment_inventory ei ON e.equipment_id = ei.equipment_id GROUP BY e.equipment_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
